postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood y Gibbs-White brillan en una victoria convincente
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest abrió su temporada 2025-26 de la Premier League con una victoria bien merecida contra el Brentford de Keith Andrews.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood e Gibbs-White brillano nella vittoria convincente
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest ha aperto la stagione 2025-26 di Premier League con una vittoria ben meritata contro il Brentford di Keith Andrews.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood e Gibbs-White brilham em vitória convincente
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest abriu a temporada 2025-26 da Premier League com uma vitória bem merecida contra o Brentford de Keith Andrews.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood and Gibbs-White shine in convincing win
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest opened their 2025-26 Premier League season with a well-earned victory against Keith Andrews' Brentford.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford : Wood et Gibbs-White brillent dans une victoire convaincante
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest a ouvert sa saison 2025-26 de Premier League avec une victoire bien méritée contre le Brentford de Keith Andrews.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood und Gibbs-White glänzen bei überzeugendem Sieg
postReview.description: Nottingham Forest begann die Premier-League-Saison 2025-26 mit einem wohlverdienten Sieg gegen Keith Andrews' Brentford.

postReview.title: نوتنغهام فورست 3-1 برينتفورد: وود وغيبس-وايت يتألقان في فوز مقنع
postReview.description: افتتح نوتنغهام فورست موسم الدوري الممتاز 2025-26 بفوز مستحق على فريق كيث أندروز برينتفورد.

postReview.title: Nottingham Forest 3-1 Brentford: Wood e Gibbs-White brilham em vitória convincente
postReview.description: O Nottingham Forest abriu sua temporada 2025-26 da Premier League com uma vitória bem conquistada contra o Brentford de Keith Andrews.

preReview.title: Nuno cuestiona la lenta contratación de Forest antes del inicio de la Premier League
preReview.description: Nottingham Forest ha realizado cuatro fichajes en esta ventana de transferencias hasta ahora, pero Nuno Espirito Santo cree que deberían moverse más rápido.

preReview.title: Nuno questions Forest's slow recruitment ahead of Premier League opener
preReview.description: Nottingham Forest have brought in four signings this transfer window so far, but Nuno Espirito Santo thinks they should be moving quicker.

preReview.title: Nuno mette in dubbio il lento reclutamento del Forest prima dell'apertura della Premier League
preReview.description: Il Nottingham Forest ha fatto quattro acquisti in questa finestra di mercato finora, ma Nuno Espirito Santo pensa che dovrebbero muoversi più velocemente.

preReview.title: Nuno questiona lentidão nas contratações do Forest antes da estreia na Premier League
preReview.description: Nottingham Forest fez quatro contratações nesta janela de transferências até agora, mas Nuno Espirito Santo acha que eles deveriam estar se movendo mais rápido.

preReview.title: Nuno hinterfragt Forests langsame Rekrutierung vor dem Premier-League-Auftakt
preReview.description: Nottingham Forest hat in diesem Transferfenster bisher vier Verpflichtungen getätigt, aber Nuno Espirito Santo ist der Meinung, dass sie sich schneller bewegen sollten.

preReview.title: Nuno remet en question le recrutement lent de Forest avant l'ouverture de la Premier League
preReview.description: Nottingham Forest a réalisé quatre recrutements lors de ce mercato jusqu'à présent, mais Nuno Espirito Santo pense qu'ils devraient aller plus vite.

preReview.title: نونو يشكك في بطء تعاقدات فورست قبل افتتاح الدوري الإنجليزي
preReview.description: جلب نوتنغهام فورست أربعة تعاقدات في نافذة الانتقالات هذه حتى الآن، لكن نونو إسبيريتو سانتو يعتقد أنه كان يجب عليهم التحرك بشكل أسرع.

preReview.title: Nuno questiona a lenta contratação do Forest antes da estreia na Premier League
preReview.description: O Nottingham Forest trouxe quatro contratações nesta janela de transferências até agora, mas Nuno Espírito Santo acha que eles deveriam estar se movendo mais rápido.

QAData.question: Who won between Nottingham Forest and Brentford on Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Nottingham Forest won 3–1 over Brentford on Sun, 17 Aug 2025 13:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Chris Wood was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.8.
Rico Henry completed the most dribbles (3) in the match.
Ola Aina won the most duels (8) in the match.
Morgan Gibbs-White created the most chances (3) in the match.
Ibrahim Sangaré committed a foul leading to a penalty for Brentford.
Sepp van den Berg made an error that led to a goal for Nottingham Forest.
Elliot Anderson completed the most passes (66) in the match.
Igor Thiago has the least touches (24) of any outfield player.
